languages.text: {n}Эвейн кажется уязвленным, но он находит в себе силы сдержать эмоции.{/n} "Что же, не смею вам больше докучать. Давайте поговорим о деле, которое свело нас в этом мрачном месте".

{n}Evayne looks offended, but he finds the strength to keep his emotions in check.{/n} "Very well, then. I dare not pester you any further. Let us discuss the matter that has brought us both to this dismal place."
languages.original_text: {n}Эвейн кажется уязвленным, но он находит в себе силы сдержать эмоции.{/n} "Что же, не смею вам больше докучать. Давайте поговорим о деле, которое свело нас в этом мрачном месте".

{n}Evayne looks offended, but he finds the strength to keep his emotions in check.{/n} "Very well, then. I dare not pester you any further. Let us discuss the matter that has brought us both to this dismal place."

languages.text: {n}Evayne parece ofendido, pero reúne entereza para reprimir sus emociones.{/n} «Está bien. No le entretendré más. Hablemos del asunto que nos ha traído a este funesto lugar».
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne looks offended, but he finds the strength to keep his emotions in check.{/n} "Very well, then. I dare not pester you any further. Let us discuss the matter that has brought us both to this dismal place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne parece ofendido, pero reúne entereza para reprimir sus emociones.{/n} «Está bien. No le entretendré más. Hablemos del asunto que nos ha traído a este funesto lugar».

languages.text: {n}Evayne sieht beleidigt aus, doch er findet die Kraft, seine Emotionen zu zügeln.{/n} "Also gut. Ich wage es nicht, Euch weiter zu bedrängen. Sprechen wir über die Angelegenheit, die uns beide auf diesen trostlosen Planetoiden geführt hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne looks offended, but he finds the strength to keep his emotions in check.{/n} "Very well, then. I dare not pester you any further. Let us discuss the matter that has brought us both to this dismal place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne sieht beleidigt aus, doch er findet die Kraft, seine Emotionen zu zügeln.{/n} "Also gut. Ich wage es nicht, Euch weiter zu bedrängen. Sprechen wir über die Angelegenheit, die uns beide auf diesen trostlosen Planetoiden geführt hat."

languages.text: {n}Evayne semble s'offusquer, mais trouve la force de réprimer ses émotions.{/n} « Eh bien, soit. Je ne vous importunerai pas davantage. Abordons plutôt la question de notre présence commune dans cet horrible endroit. »
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne looks offended, but he finds the strength to keep his emotions in check.{/n} "Very well, then. I dare not pester you any further. Let us discuss the matter that has brought us both to this dismal place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne semble s'offusquer, mais trouve la force de réprimer ses émotions.{/n} « Eh bien, soit. Je ne vous importunerai pas davantage. Abordons plutôt la question de notre présence commune dans cet horrible endroit. »

languages.text: {n}艾维尼似乎受到了冒犯，但他还是努力克制住了自己的情绪。{/n}“既然如此，我就不再继续烦扰您了。不如来谈谈，我们之所以来到这个令人不快的地方，究竟是有什么事情要办吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne looks offended, but he finds the strength to keep his emotions in check.{/n} "Very well, then. I dare not pester you any further. Let us discuss the matter that has brought us both to this dismal place."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾维尼似乎受到了冒犯，但他还是努力克制住了自己的情绪。{/n}“既然如此，我就不再继续烦扰您了。不如来谈谈，我们之所以来到这个令人不快的地方，究竟是有什么事情要办吧。”

languages.text: {n}エヴァインは気を悪くしたようだが、十分な自制心でその感情を抑えている。{/n}「そうか。ではこれ以上あなたを煩わせるのはよそう。我々がこのような悲惨な場所に来ることになった原因について話し合うとしよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne looks offended, but he finds the strength to keep his emotions in check.{/n} "Very well, then. I dare not pester you any further. Let us discuss the matter that has brought us both to this dismal place."

traits.locale_text: {n}エヴァインは気を悪くしたようだが、十分な自制心でその感情を抑えている。{/n}「分かったよ。これ以上無理は言わない。俺達がこんな陰気なところに来る原因を作った問題について話そう」
{n}エヴァインは気を悪くしたようだが、十分な自制心でその感情を抑えている。{/n}「そうか。ではこれ以上あなたを煩わせるのはよそう。我々がこのような悲惨な場所に来ることになった原因について話し合うとしよう」

languages.text: {n}Evayne gücenmiş görünüyor ama duygularını kontrol altında tutacak gücü kendinde buluyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Size bu hususta daha fazla rahatsızlık vermeyeyim. İkimizi de bu kasvetli yere getiren meseleden bahsedelim."
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne looks offended, but he finds the strength to keep his emotions in check.{/n} "Very well, then. I dare not pester you any further. Let us discuss the matter that has brought us both to this dismal place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne gücenmiş görünüyor ama duygularını kontrol altında tutacak gücü kendinde buluyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Size bu hususta daha fazla rahatsızlık vermeyeyim. İkimizi de bu kasvetli yere getiren meseleden bahsedelim."
